title: AI hype has just shaken up world’s rich list. What if boom is really bubble?
description: Oracle inked a deal to provide artificial intelligence AI giant OpenAI with USD 300 billion AUD 450 billion in computing power over five years.While Ellisons moment in the spotlight was fleeting, it also illuminated something far more significant AI has created extraordinary levels of concentration in global financial markets.This raises an uncomfortable question not only for seasoned investors, but also for everyday Australians who hold shares in AI companies via their superannuation.
content: Melbourne, Sep 15 (The Conversation) Just for a moment this week, Larry Ellison, co-founder of US cloud computing company Oracle, became the world's richest person. The octogenarian tech titan briefly overtook Elon Musk after Oracle's share price roc... [5676 chars]

title: AI can lead to 8% plus economic growth to realise the vision of 'Viksit Bharat': NITI Aayog Report
description: India can leverage Artificial Intelligence (AI) to accelerate economic growth and achieve the vision of ‘Viksit Bharat, according to a NITI Aayog roadmap. AI adoption across industries and R&D transformation could bridge nearly half the GDP growth gap, helping reach USD 8.3 trillion by 2035.

title: AI 'decisive lever' for 8% economic growth rate: NITI Aayog CEO
description: India has the opportunity to harness Artificial Intelligence (AI) as a decisive lever to achieve accelerated economic growth and realise the vision of 'Viksit Bharat', according to the roadmap released by NITI Aayog and Niti Frontier Tech Hub on Monday at New Delhi.

title: Is Artificial Intelligence the Next Co-Engineer?
description: Tech Transformation: Explore how AI is reshaping engineering roles, from automation to strategy, and why human judgment remains vital in the AI era.
content:
Today’s engineers are empowered to move beyond execution into strategic thinking—shaping systems that learn, adapt, and evolve. This transformation instills a deeper sense of purpose and responsibility.

title: Apple iOS 26 to roll out today: Check new features, updates and eligible devices
description: Apple will release iOS 26 on Monday for many devices. This update introduces a new 'Liquid Glass' design. It also expands Artificial Intelligence features across iPhones. Live Translation, Visual Intelligence, and Image Playground are new additions. Communication tools will reduce interruptions. Maps and Apple Music get smarter. The update includes accessibility and family management improvements.
